/**
 InfoBox.js - Information Display Component
 
 A simple, reusable component for displaying informational content:
 - Supports title and content sections
 - Customizable styling through className prop
 - Used for patient education and data summaries
 - Lightweight component for consistent information presentation
 
 Provides standardized formatting for informational content across the application.
 */import React from'react';import'./InfoBox.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InfoBox=_ref=>{let{title,content,className=''}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-box ".concat(className),children:[title&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"info-box-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info-box-content",children:content})]});};export default InfoBox;
